customize.title: Customize your wallet
customize.description: Wallet names are stored locally on your device.

error.name: Wallet name must be at least 4 characters.

seedPhrase.title: Write Down Your Seed Phrase
seedPhrase.description: This is your seed phrase. Write it down on paper and keep it in a safe place. You'll be asked to re-enter this phrase (in order) on the next step.

confirmSeedPhrase.title: Confirm Seed Phrase
confirmSeedPhrase.description: Select each word in the order it was presented to you

mask.title: Tap to reveal your seed phrase
mask.description: Make sure no one is watching your screen.

success.title: Congratulations

primaryDescription.2: Remember to keep your seed phrase safe, it's your responsibility!

success.secondaryDescription: Gasless Wallet cannot recover your wallet if you lose it.

exists.title: Existing Wallet
exists.description: Import wallet with a 12 secret recovery words

modal.title: Sign out of All Wallets?
modal.description: This will erase keys to all wallets. Make sure you have backed up your recovery phrases.
